import React from "react"; import './summary.css'; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Alert from "./delete_alert"; const SummaryPage = ({closeSum, props})=>{ const [viewAlert, setAlert] = useState(false); const [orderData, setOrderData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:3004/order') .then(data => data.json()) .then((data) => {setOrderData([...orderData, data]) }) console.log(orderData); }, []) if(viewAlert){ return } return( <>

Summary

  • Store Location
  • Ashok Nagar
  • Store Address
  • Near Phone booth, 10th road,
  • Phone
  • 91 999999999

Order Track

Order Detail

Address

Home

) } export default SummaryPage;
